Keywords: Animal , Arakko , Assassin , Warrior
Real Name: Pogg Ur-Pogg
Special Powers
SWORD BEARER: Pogg Ur-Pogg starts the game with any Sword equipment equipped and can use its EFFECT regardless of being a non-standard character.
AN ENTIRE NEW WORLD TO PLUNDER: When Pogg Ur-Pogg hits a single target with a close attack, you may choose to deal a maximum of 1 damage to a hit target. If you do, unequip that character and if another friendly character is adjacent to Pogg Ur-Pogg or the hit character, you may choose that character to equip the unequipped equipment.
AN ENTIRE WORLD, SAYS YOU?: Charge, Flurry.
NOW I KNOW YOU'RE MY OPPONENT...: STOP. Toughness.
